title: Hold Person
desc:
Post 1633
- Choose a player. You both roll a d20. If you roll higher, their turn is skipped permanently. On their turn, they may roll a d20 to escape, ending the turn skips. If they roll a 20, they escape. After 10 rounds, they automatically escape.
If they roll a 1, they cannot attempt again next turn.
- Costs 5 Spell Slots.
